name: NEON RUSH (BansheeGG)
description:
A game about jumping, warping and walking at a brisk speed through a maze of scaffolding and neon lights.

Controls are:

A / D - Move

SPACEBAR - Jump

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - Warp to crosshair when in range of a neon light

 Made in 3 days for the Amaze Me Gamejam 2021
